<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>21907f60-bad5-45aa-bf52-cac24ec234c3#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A maltóz molekulájának egyszerűsített ábrázolása</string>
            <string language="en">simple illustration of maltose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">einfache Abbildung von Maltose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">illustration simple de maltose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ilustração simples do maltose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">illustrazione semplice di maltosio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απλή απεικόνιση maltose</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ilustración simple de la maltosa</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A maltóz molekulájának félkonstitúciós képlete</string>
            <string language="en">simple illustration of maltose</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">maltózmolekula,  diszacharidok,  szénhidrátok,  cukrok,  glikozidkötés,  éterkötés,  </string>
            <string language="en">maltose molecule,  disacharids,  carbohydrates, sugar,  glikozid bond,  ether bond,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">einfache Abbildung von Maltose</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">illustration simple de maltose</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ilustração simples do maltose</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">illustrazione semplice di maltosio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απλή απεικόνιση maltose</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ilustración simple de la maltosa</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Maltosemolekül, disacharids, Kohlenhydrate, Zucker, 
glikozid Bindung, Ätherbindung,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">molécule de maltose, disacharids, hydrates de carbone, 
sucre, obligation de glikozid, obligation d'éther,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">molécula do maltose, disacharids, hidratos de carbono,
açúcar, ligação do glikozid, ligação do ether,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molecola del maltosio, disacharids, carboidrati, 
zucchero, legame del glikozid, legame dell'etere,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">maltose το μόριο, disacharids, υδατάνθρακες, ζάχαρη, 
glikozid συνδέει, δεσμός αιθέρα,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">molécula de la maltosa, disacharids, carbohidratos, 
azúcar, enlace del glikozid, enlace del éter,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

          </purpose>

        <metaMetadata>
